treasury contract for the SUITE token ecosystem  Key Features: - Deposit any token \u2192 swapped to USDC \u2192 mint SUITE - Withdraw SUITE \u2192 burn \u2192 receive USDC - 0.5% fee on deposits and withdrawals - Backing rate: $1 = 1,000 SUITE (1000 * 10^18 tokens per USDC unit) - Pausable for emergencies - Upgradeable for future features  Upgrade Path: - V2: Multi-asset treasury - V3: Governance voting on allocations","errors":{"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not authorizeApp(address).details: Authorize an app contract to burn SUITE for usage

chargeUser(address,uint256).details: Called by authorized apps to charge users for usage Burns SUITE from user's balance

params.suiteAmount: Amount of SUITE to burn (18 decimals)

depositToken(address,uint256,uint256,byt.details: Deposit any token, swap to USDC, receive SUITE

params.minUsdcOut: Minimum USDC to receive from swap (slippage protection)
params.swapData: Encoded swap data for the router

depositUSDC(uint256).details: Deposit USDC directly and receive SUITE tokens

params.amount: Amount of USDC to deposit (6 decimals)

depositYield(uint256).details: Deposit yield profits (increases backing for all holders) Called by owner after earning yield from DeFi strategies

getBackingRate().details: Get current backing rate (USDC per 1000 SUITE) Returns value in USDC (6 decimals)

getTreasuryValue().details: Get total treasury value in USDC

initialize(address,address,address).details: Initialize the treasury (called once on deploy)

params._suiteToken: Address of the SUITE token contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.suiteAmount: Amount of SUITE to burn (18 decimals)

withdrawForYield(address,uint256).details: Withdraw for yield strategies (owner only) Use carefully - this is funds being moved to yield protocols
